scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:sass && mkdir -p lib/sass && ncp src/sass lib/sass && mkdir -p lib/stylus && ncp src/stylus lib/stylus
scripts.build:sass: mkdir -p dist && node-sass src/sass/minuet.scss dist/minuet.css --output-style=expanded --include-path=src/sass && node-sass src/sass/minuet.scss dist/minuet.min.css --output-style=compressed --include-path=src/sass
scripts.build:stylus: mkdir -p dist && stylus src/stylus/minuet.styl -o dist/minuet.css -I src/stylus --include-css && stylus src/stylus/minuet.styl -o dist/minuet.min.css -I src/stylus --include-css -c
scripts.play: rimraf playground/public && jade -w -O "{basedir:'playground/app/templates'}" -o playground/public playground/app/templates/views & webpack-dev-server --inline --hot --config playground/webpack.config.babel.js --content-base playground/public --port 8080
